name: Johnny Kung Fu™
description: Johnny Kung Fu is an old school action game that mixes the old with the new! Johnny Kung Fu puts you into the Kung Fu garb of a seemingly everyday man, Johnny. The local organised crime group, The Mr Wang Gang, led by the mysterious man known as Mr Wang, seems to have a bone to pick with Johnny and has captured his girlfriend Paula. Knowing that an ambush awaits him, Johnny chases the kidnappers into one of Mr Wang’s hideout towers regardless. Will Johnny be able to save Paula or will the Mr Wang Gang prevail?
